entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as 'Harry' by Moody.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: A character who is revealed to be guiding Harry through the tasks without arousing suspicion.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts, mentioned as being nudged by Moody into showing Harry the dragons.

entities.name: goblet of fire
entities.description: A magical object that is used to select participants for a tournament.

relationships.description: Moody is guiding Harry through the tasks without arousing suspicion.
Moody put Harry's name in the Goblet of Fire under a different school's name.
Moody nudged Hagrid into showing Harry the dragons.
